entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.6.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • refactor: simplify proxy configuration for blue/green deployments by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/406

Misc changes

  • feat: show server limits on the settings page by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/404
  • chore: add link to docs in health check by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/407

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.6.5...v1.6.6

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features :

In this release, we added multiple major features : - a new onboarding page in #408 by @mo-cherif for when you first install zaneops - a new toast notification will appear when there is a new update available, prompting you to update via the UI directly instead of the terminal in #417 - A new Environments feature, allowing you to create/edit/delete and clone environments: When environments are cloned, all services, variables and configs are copied to the new env. And you can choose to deploy (or not) all the services you just copied from the cloned environment.

commits

  • feat: endpoint for user creation on the UI by @mo-cherif in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/405
  • feat: initial registration ui by @mo-cherif in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/408
  • refactor: add password confirmation to onboarding page by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/411
  • feat: automatic update workflow and activity by @mo-cherif in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/414
  • feat: add discord social link in dashboard footer by @mo-cherif in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/415
  • feat: automatic updates check (frontend) by @mo-cherif in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/417
  • feat: environments (backend) by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/409
  • feat: environments (frontend) by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/418

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.6.6...v1.7.0
